channel.title: How to Build a Server?
channel.description:
I have played on many different private servers and I haven't been completely satisfied with any of them. That's why I want to build my own server from scratch. The only problem is that I don't really know how to. I was thinking about using the rs2dv base stickied in the downloads section. I just have no clue where to begin. If anyone can post links to guides or give me any information that may help please do. Also let me know if you need to know anything else. Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2008, 08:51:10 pm[/size][hr]I was looking on the forums and I found these:
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,270348.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,270348.0.html[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,284847.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,284847.0.html[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285152.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285152.0.html[/url]
Will any of these guides help me make a server?

item.title: How to Build a Server?
item.dc:creator: @smellz smellz
item.description:
@smellz wrote:

what would u recommend I use to start my server?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2008, 09:51:43 pm[/size][hr]I also found these on google.

http://www.trap17.com/forums/runescape-2-private-server-guide-part-1-t48224.html
http://www.trap17.com/forums/runescape-2-private-server-guide-part-2-t48386.html

they seem like really good guides but i can’t find part 3 or 4 to complete the server and get it online

Read full topic

item.title: How to Build a Server?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Those 3 guides will help you setup rs2d and the first will help you make a handler for commands. For a first server rs2d isn’t exactly the best choice unless you are extremely willing to learn Java, instead of “RSPS code” as others call it in wL sources.

Read full topic
